alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 09 at 1:27PM CST until December 09 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND EAST CENTRAL STEWART COUNTIES... At 126 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located 7 miles southeast of Big Rock, or 10 miles east of Dover, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Indian Mound, Woodlawn, and Palmyra. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
